titleStmt.title: An appendix to Solomon's prescription for the removal of the pestilence enforcing the same from a consideration of the late dreadful judgement by fire : together with some perswasions to all, especially suffering Christians, to exercise and maintain faith and patience, courage and comfort, in this dark and cloudy day / by M.M.
titleStmt.author: Mead, Matthew, 1630?-1699.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
